com.syndloanhub.loansum.product.facility.prorated

Class ProratedFacility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.syndloanhub.loansum.product.facility.prorated.ProratedFacility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProratedProduct, org.joda.beans.Bean, org.joda.beans.ImmutableBean

    public final class ProratedFacility
extends Object
implements ProratedProduct, org.joda.beans.ImmutableBean
    A loan prorated based on a specific trade.

    • Method Detail

      • getFundedAmount

        public double getFundedAmount(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Return the prorated funded amount as of a specific date by simply summing the prorated amount of each active contract on that date, accounting for any repayments.
        Parameters:
        date - to return funded amount.
        Returns:
        total amount of all active contracts as of date

      • getUnfundedAmount

        public double getUnfundedAmount(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Return the prorated unfunded amount as of a specific date.
        Parameters:
        date - to return funded amount.
        Returns:
        total commitment minus total amount of all active contracts as of date

      • getCommitmentAmount

        public double getCommitmentAmount(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Return the global commitment amount as of a specific date
        Parameters:
        date - to return commitment amount.
        Returns:
        commitment amount
